customHTML.value:
{{global.parameters.companyLogo}}

Magic Link

Request that a magic link be sent to your email address to authenticate.

{{#if canChangeDevice}} {{/if}}

{{global.parameters.companyLogo}}

Magic Link Authentication

If you have an account with a valid email address, a Magic Link will be sent.

Please click the magic link sent to continue.

[[[skcomponent###c2tjb21wb25lbnQgInNrcG9sbGluZyIgIGNsYXNzPSIiIHBvbGxJbnRlcnZhbD0iMzAwMCIgcG9sbFJldHJpZXM9IjM1IiBwb2xsQ2hhbGxlbmdlU3RhdHVzPSJ0cnVlIg==###]]]

{{#if canChangeDevice}}

Success

You are logged in using a magic link.

Return to the original window.

Error

Magic Link has expired.
